channel.title: business on Greg McMullen
channel.description: Recent content in business on Greg McMullen

item.title: Law of the Lid
item.description: Recently I was given a copy of The 21 Irrefutable Laws of Leadership and decided that I will partake in applying these laws to my life online. My hope is that I can also urge you, my readers and friends, to also partake and keep me accountable for my goals, dreams and ambitions as I also help you. Major Goals List your major goals. No more than ten; no less than five.
